text: A Teacher of Singing () is a 1972 Soviet comedy movie directed by Naum Birman.Российская актриса Людмила Иванова. БиографияУЧИТЕЛЬ ПЕНИЯ It stars Andrei Popov, Irina Alfyorova, and Igor Bogdanov. == Actors == * Andrei Popov as The teacher of singing * Irina Alfyorova as The teacher's daughter * Igor Bogdanov * Nikolay Boyarskiy as Cameo * Aleksandr Demyanenko * Yevgeny Yevstigneev * Lyudmila Ivanova * Konstantin Koshkin * Yevgeniya Sabelnikova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Naum Birman
title: A Teacher of Singing
